text: Abdullahi Dikko Inde MFR, OFR (11 May 1960 â€“ 18 February 2021) was a Nigerian government official. He was the Comptroller-General of Nigerian Customs Service from August 2009 to August 2015. Dikko died at an Abuja hospital on February 18, 2021 at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians
title: Abdullahi Dikko
